description: Describes Capacity Block offerings available for purchase in the Amazon Web Services Region that you're currently using. With Capacity Blocks, you purchase a specific instance type for a period of time. To search for an available Capacity Block offering, you specify a reservation duration and instance count.

parameters.name: CapacityDurationHours
parameters.description: The reservation duration for the Capacity Block, in hours. You must specify the duration in 1-day increments up 14 days, and in 7-day increments up to 182 days.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockOfferings
nested_items.description: The recommended Capacity Block offering for the dates specified.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockOfferingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Capacity Block offering.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type of the Capacity Block offering.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone of the Capacity Block offering.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances in the Capacity Block offering.

nested_items.name: StartDate
nested_items.description: The start date of the Capacity Block offering.

nested_items.name: EndDate
nested_items.description: The end date of the Capacity Block offering.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockDurationHours
nested_items.description: The number of hours (in addition to capacityBlockDurationMinutes) for the duration of the Capacity Block reservation. For example, if a Capacity Block starts at 04:55 and ends at 11:30, the hours field would be 6.

nested_items.name: UpfrontFee
nested_items.description: The total price to be paid up front.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency of the payment for the Capacity Block.

nested_items.name: Tenancy
nested_items.description: The tenancy of the Capacity Block.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockDurationMinutes
nested_items.description: The number of minutes (in addition to capacityBlockDurationHours) for the duration of the Capacity Block reservation. For example, if a Capacity Block starts at 08:55 and ends at 11:30, the minutes field would be 35.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
